Services

We breathe life into your rotary powered vehicle.

Engine building

Whether you need your engine refreshed for your unmodified classic, or you need an engine taylored specifically for your racing style, Rotor RE-hab has you covered. We have been building reliable and powerful rotary engines for years!

Engine porting

Rotor RE-hab specializes in rotary engine porting. We have made proven and reliable power with our ports and can do everything from a mild streetport all the way up to peripheral ports.

Performance parts installs

From single turbo conversions, suspension fine-tuning, aero upgrades, and just about anything that makes a car perform better, Rotor RE-hab has you covered. We have been making cars fast for a long time and know what works and what doesn't!

Maintenance and repairs

From oil services, to brake jobs, to advanced diagostics, you can rest knowing that your vehicle is in good hands. Rotor RE-hab's technicians are ASE certified and have over 12 years of professional experience.

ECU tuning

The secret to a reliable and powerful rotary engine is in the tune. Rotor RE-hab has the know-how to make your engine operate at its full potential.

Contact us to see what we can do for you.
